meanings.sent1: The teacher praised the selected students for their hard work.
meanings.sent2: She wore her selected dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The selected cupcakes disappeared quickly at the school bake sale.
meanings.sent4: The selected few were granted access to the exclusive event.
meanings.sent5: The selected flowers in the garden stood out with their vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: He selected a book from the shelf to read before bed.
meanings.sent2: She carefully selected the perfect gift for her friend's birthday.
meanings.sent3: The cat selected the sunniest spot in the room for its nap.
meanings.sent4: The chef selected the freshest ingredients for the special dish.
meanings.sent5: The player selected the winning card from the deck.

meanings.sent1: The selected items in the store window caught her eye.
meanings.sent2: He proudly displayed his selected collection of stamps.
meanings.sent3: The selected playlist for the road trip kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent4: The selected words in the poem painted a vivid picture.
meanings.sent5: The selected outfit for the interview made a great impression.
